title: Duck à l'orange
description: The addition of kumquats gives this duck à l’orange a modern twist. Served with garlicky duck fat-roasted potatoes.
ingredients: 1kg/2lb 4oz potatoes, left unpeeled, cut into small chunks
1 tbsp duck fat (optional, can use 2 tbsp olive oil instead)
1 bulb garlic, broken up into cloves
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
salt and freshly ground black pepper
